meanings.definition: A long, loose robe worn by men in the Middle East.
meanings.sent1: He wore his comfortable galabiehs to stay cool in the hot desert.
meanings.sent2: The market was filled with colorful galabiehs hanging on display.
meanings.sent3: The galabiehs danced in the wind like playful ghosts.
meanings.sent4: His galabiehs were a shield against the scorching sun.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the flowing galabiehs was a symbol of relaxation.

meanings.sent1: The shopkeeper displayed a variety of galabiehs for sale.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends each bought different colored galabiehs.
meanings.sent3: The galabiehs piled up in the closet, creating a rainbow of fabric.
meanings.sent4: The galabiehs filled the room with a burst of vibrant hues.
meanings.sent5: The collection of galabiehs was a feast for the eyes.
